1.content: Analyze current failing tests on Mobile Chrome and Desktop Chrome
1.details: Run targeted test analysis to identify specific failing tests and their root causes. Focus on the remaining 17% failures in Mobile Chrome and 40% failures in Desktop Chrome.

2.content: Fix Mobile Chrome remaining failures (improve from 83% to 95%+)
2.details: Target the remaining ~3 failing tests on Mobile Chrome to achieve near-perfect pass rate

3.content: Fix Desktop Chrome remaining failures (improve from 60% to 90%+)
3.details: Target the remaining ~19 failing tests on Desktop Chrome by addressing common failure patterns
